subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Kenny Cooper scored his 11th goal of the season and the Red Bulls tied visiting Chivas U.S.A., 1-1, in a Major League Soccer game in Harrison, N.J.
snippet: Kenny Cooper scored his 11th goal of the season and the Red Bulls tied visiting Chivas U.S.A., 1-1, in a Major League Soccer game in Harrison, N.J.
